name: Historic Bridge
fact: This bridge was built in 1935 and connects two historic districts. It's one of the oldest steel bridges in the region.

name: Old Town Square
fact: The Old Town Square dates back to the 13th century. Many of the buildings here survived the great fire of 1624.

name: Mountain View
fact: From this viewpoint, you can see three different mountain ranges on a clear day. The highest peak visible is 1,200 meters tall.
